title: Sprout House
description: Fresh fruits & vegetables including organic, juice bar, vitamins, deli offers salads, sandwiches, and soups. Also, the Sprout House carries non-GMO products, including specialty prepared foods, soups year-round, tofu and organic produce. In addition, the Sprout House also carries natural cleaning products, cosmetics and an assortment of groceries. It participate in the Saturday Market May through October from 9am-1pm every Saturday.
